PC Number: 2003-0998

Date: 2003-06-18

                      Whereas the Gwich’in Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (“the Gwich’in Agreement”) was approved, given effect and declared valid pursuant to section 4 of the Gwich’in Land Claim Settlement Act, S.C. 1992, c. 53;


                      Whereas section 3.1.27 of the Gwich’in Agreement provides that the Agreement may be amended with the consent of government, as represented by the Governor in Council, and the Gwich’in, as represented by the Gwich’in Tribal Council;


                      Whereas the Sahtu Dene and Metis Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (“the Sahtu Agreement”) was approved, given effect and declared valid pursuant to section 4 of the Sahtu Dene and Metis Land Claim Settlement Act, S.C. 1994, c. 27;


                      Whereas subsection 3.1.26 of the Sahtu Agreement provides that the Agreement may be amended with the consent of government, as represented by the Governor in Council, and the Sahtu Dene and Metis, as represented by the Sahtu Secretariat Incorporated;


                      Whereas the proposed amendments have been approved by the Gwich’in Tribal Council on October 8, 2002 and by the Sahtu Secretariat Incorporated on October 11, 2002 in accordance with the procedure set out in the applicable Agreements;


                      Whereas the proposed amendments are not within the jurisdiction of the Government of the Northwest Territories, do not affect its programs or responsibilities and do not impose financial obligations on it, and therefore these amendments do not require approval of the Executive Council of the Government of the Northwest Territories under paragraph 3.1.27(c) of the Gwich’in Agreement and under paragraph 3.1.26(a) of the Sahtu Agreement;


                      And whereas the proposed amendments shall be effective as at the date of this Order;


                      Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, and pursuant to section 3.1.27 of the Gwich’in Agreement and section 3.1.26 of the Sahtu Agreement, hereby consents to the amendments to paragraph 11.3.3(e) of the Gwich’in Agreement and paragraph 11.3.3(e) of the Sahtu Agreement, which is set out in the annexed schedule.
